Title: Establishes tuition awards for members of the reserve armed forces of the United States
Summary: Establishes tuition awards for members of the reserved armed forces of the United States; provides eligibility for such tuition benefit shall be determined by the education services offices of the division of military and naval affairs; restricts such tuition benefit to legal residents of the state; establishes a tuition award account.
LawCode: Add ยง669-i, amd ยง604, Ed L; add ยง91-h, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the state finance law, in relation to tuition awards for active members of the reserve armed forces of the United States; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
